TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Takidis, title = Takidis, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Takidis} }

S.FORM: Takidis Itiniay i Taimali Cen no Taitung ko Takidis a niyaro', 157 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 371 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 57% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 212 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 43% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 159 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko 人口數有出入. O katadamaanan no niyaro'

Takidis Itiniay i Taimali Cen no Taitong ko Takidis a niyaro', 157 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 371 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 57% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 212 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 43% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 159 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko 人口數有出入. O katadamaanan no niyaro'
